title: Beautiful Strangers
description: First book in the Hyacinth Dickinson SeriesA Romantic Thriller.BE CAREFUL WHAT YOU WISH FOR - IT MIGHT COME TRUE!Gynaecologist Hyacinth Dickinson cast a spell for her perfect woman.A woman to match her desire for danger, diamonds and sex.When Hyacinth meets Beth she believes her to be The One.Would you trust a woman to read your mind?Who wanted to control you - body and soul?Who stirs such passion in you, you don't know whether you love or hate her?A woman who entices you into her web and leaves you no choice but to commit relationship suicide?Talented surgeon Beth McConnell had to - but she had her reasons . . .Beautiful actress Lou Scott wasn't looking for love when she boarded the London bound train.Or was she?
author: Ellen Dean
